name: Berry Good Elderflower Sangria
description: This sangria is so good you’ll be on cloud “wine”! This refreshing summer bevy is perfect for weekend getaways with pals. The ingredients easily pack up for quick assembly poolside, on the cottage dock, at the beach, and even while glamping! Pssst: Grilled Salmon makes the perfect food pairing!

ingredients.name: berries, fresh or frozen, your choice

preparation: Place berries into large pitcher. Pour in tea, wine, and soda water; stir to mix.
Pour over ice into four glasses.
tips: Add a splash of rum or brandy to give your sangria some extra “oomph”.
For a non-alcoholic version, use fruit juices such as cranberry, grape, or apple instead of wine.
Don’t have Elderflower Cordial Herbal Tea? Try a lemony version with prepared Pink Lemonade Herbal Tea.
